doc.title: Beauty Will Save the World
doc.plot: The Film is charting the journey of 19 year old Tecca Zedick a contestant in the miss net world contest Libya's first every beauty competition. Featuring footage of colonel muammar Qaddafi. Teca's story reveals an incredible conclusion non one could have guessed when private jests transported the beauties to the country feared by the west in the 1980's beauty will save the world.
